selected_skills.name: calculate_length_CD
selected_skills.purpose: Calculate the length of the hypotenuse in a right triangle using the Pythagorean theorem.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the known lengths of the other two sides to calculate the hypotenuse.

selected_skills.name: map_length_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: Map the calculated length to one of the multiple-choice options.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Compare the calculated stretch length with the given options and select the closest match.
